title: Martin Kristjansen
text:
Martin Kristjansen (born 12 November 1977) is a <a href="Denmark">Danish</a> <a href="lightweight">lightweight</a> <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="Slagelse">Slagelse</a>, <a href="Denmark">Denmark</a>. He is a former WBO inter-continental lightweight champion.
Kristjansen was ranked first in the <a href="WBO">WBO</a> Lightweight rankings when he fought the third ranked British Lightweight <a href="Amir%20Khan%20%28British%20boxer%29">Amir Khan</a> on 5 April 2008 in a title eliminator. After an onslaught from Khan in the seventh round, the referee stopped the fight with the Dane unable to defend himself.
